40 const std::size_t STLBase::BINARY_HEADER_SIZE = 80 * sizeof(STLBase::BINARY_UINT8);
41 const std::size_t STLBase::BINARY_MINIMUM_SIZE = STLBase::BINARY_HEADER_SIZE + sizeof(STLBase::BINARY_UINT32);
42 
43 const std::string STLBase::ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN = "solid";
44 const std::string STLBase::ASCII_SOLID_END = "endsolid";
45 const std::string STLBase::ASCII_FACET_BEGIN = "facet";
46 const std::string STLBase::ASCII_FACET_END = "endfacet";
47 const std::string STLBase::ASCII_FILE_BEGIN = STLBase::ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN + " ";
48 const std::string STLBase::ASCII_FILE_END = STLBase::ASCII_SOLID_END;
49 const std::size_t STLBase::ASCII_MINIMUM_SIZE = STLBase::ASCII_FILE_BEGIN.length() + STLBase::ASCII_FILE_END.length();

125 STLReader::STLReader(const std::string &filename, Format format)
126  : STLBase(filename)
127 {
128  if (format == FormatUnknown) {
129  format = detectFormat(filename);
130  }
131 
132  if (format == FormatUnknown) {
133  throw std::runtime_error("Invalid STL format.");
134  }
135 
136  setFormat(format);
137 }
138 
144 STLReader::Format STLReader::detectFormat(const std::string &filename)
145 {
146  std::ifstream fileStream;
147 
148  // Get the file size
149  fileStream.open(filename, std::ifstream::ate | std::ifstream::binary);
150  if (!fileStream.good()) {
151  fileStream.close();
152  throw std::runtime_error("Invalid STL.");
153  }
154 
155  std::size_t fileSize = fileStream.tellg();
156  fileStream.close();
157  fileStream.clear();
158 
159  //
160  // ASCII check
161  //
162 
163  // Check if the size is compatible with an ASCII STL file.
164  //
165  // An ASCII contains at least the "solid " and "endsolid" markers, therefore
166  // the minimum size of an empty ASCII file is 14 bytes.
167  if (fileSize < ASCII_MINIMUM_SIZE) {
168  return FormatUnknown;
169  }
170 
171  // If a files starts with "solid" and ends with "endsolid" is an ASCII file.
172  //
173  // Binary files should never start with "solid ", but that's not mandatory.
174  // We need to check both the beginning and the and of the file to be sure
175  // of the file format.
176  char c;
177  std::size_t bufferPos;
178 
179  bufferPos = 0;
180  std::string beginString(ASCII_FILE_BEGIN.size(), ' ');
181  fileStream.open(filename, std::ifstream::binary);
182  while (fileStream.get(c)) {
183  if (bufferPos == 0 && (std::isblank(c) || std::isspace(c))) {
184  continue;
185  }
186 
187  beginString.at(bufferPos) = tolower(c);
188  ++bufferPos;
189  if (bufferPos == ASCII_FILE_BEGIN.size()) {
190  break;
191  }
192  }
193  fileStream.close();
194  fileStream.clear();
195 
196  bool maybeASCII = (beginString.compare(ASCII_FILE_BEGIN) == 0);
197  if (maybeASCII) {
198  // Open the file
199  fileStream.open(filename, std::ifstream::ate | std::ifstream::binary);
200 
201  // Move the cursor at the beginning of the last non-empty line
202  bool empty = true;
203  fileStream.seekg(-1, std::ios_base::cur);
204  while (fileStream.get(c)) {
205  if (c == '\n') {
206  if (!empty) {
207  break;
208  }
209  }
210 
211  if (empty) {
212  empty = (!std::isblank(c) && !std::isspace(c));
213  }
214 
215  fileStream.seekg(-2, std::ios_base::cur);
216  }
217 
218  // Search the end-line keyword
219  bufferPos = 0;
220  std::string endString(ASCII_SOLID_END.size(), ' ');
221  while (fileStream.get(c)) {
222  if (bufferPos == 0 && (std::isblank(c) || std::isspace(c))) {
223  continue;
224  }
225 
226  endString.at(bufferPos) = tolower(c);
227  ++bufferPos;
228  if (bufferPos == ASCII_SOLID_END.size()) {
229  break;
230  }
231  }
232 
233  // Close the file
234  fileStream.close();
235  fileStream.clear();
236 
237  // Check if the end-solid keyword was found
238  bool isASCII = (endString.compare(ASCII_SOLID_END) == 0);
239  if (isASCII) {
240  return FormatASCII;
241  }
242  }
243 
244  //
245  // Binary check
246  //
247 
248  // Check if the size is compatible with a binary STL file.
249  //
250  // An empty binary file contains the header and the number of facets,
251  // therefore the minimum size of an empty binary file is 84 bytes.
252  if (fileSize < BINARY_MINIMUM_SIZE) {
253  return FormatUnknown;
254  }
255 
256  // Read the number of facets
257  std::uint32_t nFacets;
258 
259  fileStream.open(filename, std::ifstream::binary);
260  fileStream.seekg(BINARY_HEADER_SIZE);
261  fileStream.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&nFacets), sizeof(BINARY_UINT32));
262  fileStream.close();
263  fileStream.clear();
264 
265  // Check that the size of the file is compatiblewith the number of facets
266  //
267  // Each facet has three facet and each facet contains:
268  // - Normal: 3 float_32
269  // - Vertices' coordinates: 3x float_32
270  // - Attribute byte count: 1 unit_16
271  const std::size_t BINARY_FACET_SIZE = 3 * sizeof(BINARY_REAL32) +
272  3 * 3 * sizeof(BINARY_REAL32) +
273  sizeof(BINARY_UINT16);
274 
275  std::size_t expectedFileSize = BINARY_HEADER_SIZE + sizeof(BINARY_UINT32) + (nFacets * BINARY_FACET_SIZE);
276  if (fileSize == expectedFileSize) {
277  return FormatBinary;
278  }
279 
280  return FormatUnknown;
281 }
282 
293 int STLReader::inspect(InspectionInfo *info)
294 {
295  // Begin read
296  int beginError = readBegin();
297  if (beginError != 0) {
298  return beginError;
299  }
300 
301  // Get format
302  Format format = getFormat();
303 
304  // Inspect file
305  int inspectionError;
306  if (format == FormatASCII) {
307  inspectionError = inspectASCII(info);
308  } else {
309  inspectionError = inspectBinary(info);
310  }
311 
312  // End read
313  int endError = readEnd();
314 
315  // Done
316  if (inspectionError != 0) {
317  return inspectionError;
318  } else if (endError != 0) {
319  return endError;
320  } else {
321  return 0;
322  }
323 }
324 
334 int STLReader::inspectASCII(InspectionInfo *info)
335 {
336  // Initialize info
337  info->nSolids = 0;
338  info->solidErrors.clear();
339  info->solidNames.clear();
340  info->solidFacetCount.clear();
341  info->solidVertexCount.clear();
342 
343  // Check stream status
344  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
345  return -1;
346  }
347 
348  // Set cursor at file begin
349  m_fileHandle.clear();
350  long start_pos = m_fileHandle.tellg();
351  m_fileHandle.seekg(0);
352 
353  // Scan file
354  std::string word;
355  std::stringstream sname;
356 
357  int inspectionError = 0;
358  while (m_lineStream.readLine(m_fileHandle) >= 0) {
359  // Get keyword
360  if ((m_lineStream >> word) && (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN) == 0)) {
361  // Initialize inspection info
362  int solidIndex = info->nSolids;
363 
364  ++info->nSolids;
365  info->solidErrors.emplace_back();
366  info->solidNames.emplace_back("");
367  info->solidFacetCount.emplace_back(0);
368  info->solidVertexCount.emplace_back(0);
369 
370  // Get solid name
371  sname.str("");
372  while (m_lineStream >> word) {
373  sname << word << " ";
374  }
375  std::string name = sname.str();
376  utils::string::trim(name);
377  info->solidNames[solidIndex] = name;
378 
379  // Get solid info
380  inspectionError = inspectSolidASCII(info->solidFacetCount.data() + solidIndex, info->solidErrors.data() + solidIndex);
381  if (inspectionError != 0) {
382  break;
383  }
384 
385  info->solidVertexCount[solidIndex] = 3 * info->solidFacetCount[solidIndex];
386  }
387  }
388 
389  // Restore cursor position
390  m_fileHandle.clear();
391  m_fileHandle.seekg(start_pos);
392 
393  return inspectionError;
394 }
395 
414 int STLReader::inspectSolidASCII(std::size_t *nFacets, std::array<bool, 6> *errors)
415 {
416  // Initialize solid information
417  (*nFacets) = 0;
418  errors->fill(false);
419 
420  // Check stream status
421  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
422  return -1;
423  }
424 
425  // Inspect the solid
426  std::string word;
427  long last_valid_pos;
428 
429  int inspectError = 0;
430  while (true) {
431  // Get next line
432  last_valid_pos = m_fileHandle.tellg();
433  m_lineStream.readLine(m_fileHandle);
434  if (!(m_lineStream >> word)) {
435  word = "";
436  }
437 
438  // Exit conditions
439  if (m_fileHandle.eof()) {
440  break;
441  } else if (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_END) == 0) {
442  break;
443  } else if (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN) == 0) {
444  break;
445  }
446 
447  // Look for keyword "facet"
448  if (word.compare(ASCII_FACET_BEGIN) == 0) {
449  ++(*nFacets);
450 
451  m_fileHandle.seekg(last_valid_pos);
452  inspectError = inspectFacetASCII(errors);
453  if (inspectError != 0) {
454  break;
455  }
456  }
457  }
458 
459  // Check block temination
460  if (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_END) != 0) {
461  (*errors)[0] = true;
462  m_fileHandle.clear();
463  m_fileHandle.seekg(last_valid_pos);
464  }
465 
466  return inspectError;
467 }
468 
482 int STLReader::inspectFacetASCII(std::array<bool, 6> *errors)
483 {
484  // Check stream status
485  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
486  return -1;
487  }
488 
489  // Check facet data
490  std::string word;
491  long last_valid_pos;
492 
493  last_valid_pos = m_fileHandle.tellg();
494  m_lineStream.readLine(m_fileHandle);
495  if ((!(m_lineStream >> word)) || (word.compare(ASCII_FACET_BEGIN) == 0)) {
496  word = "begin";
497  }
498 
499  std::size_t nV = 0;
500  bool normal_found = false;
501  while ((!m_fileHandle.eof())
502  && ((word.compare(ASCII_FACET_END) != 0)
503  && (word.compare(ASCII_FACET_BEGIN) != 0)
504  && (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_END) != 0)
505  && (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN) != 0))) {
506 
507  // Check facet normal or facet vertices
508  if (word.compare("begin") == 0) {
509  if ((m_lineStream >> word) && (word.compare("normal") == 0)) {
510  normal_found = true;
511 
512  int nxyz = 0;
513  while (m_lineStream >> word) {
514  nxyz++;
515  }
516 
517  if (nxyz != 3) {
518  (*errors)[3] = true;
519  }
520  }
521  }
522  else if (word.compare("vertex") == 0) {
523  nV++;
524 
525  int nxyz = 0;
526  while (m_lineStream >> word) {
527  nxyz++;
528  }
529 
530  if (nxyz != 3) {
531  (*errors)[5] = true;
532  }
533  }
534 
535  // Get next line
536  last_valid_pos = m_fileHandle.tellg();
537  m_lineStream.readLine(m_fileHandle);
538  if (!(m_lineStream >> word)) {
539  word = "";
540  }
541  }
542 
543  // Check if facket section is properly closed
544  if (word.compare(ASCII_FACET_END) != 0) {
545  (*errors)[1] = true;
546  m_fileHandle.clear(),
547  m_fileHandle.seekg(last_valid_pos);
548  }
549 
550  // Check if normal is valid
551  if (!normal_found) {
552  (*errors)[2] = true;
553  }
554 
555  // Check if number of vertices is valid
556  if (nV != 3) {
557  (*errors)[4] = true;
558  }
559 
560  return 0;
561 }
562 
572 int STLReader::inspectBinary(InspectionInfo *info)
573 {
574  // Initialize info
575  info->nSolids = 0;
576  info->solidErrors.clear();
577  info->solidNames.clear();
578  info->solidFacetCount.clear();
579  info->solidVertexCount.clear();
580 
581  // Check stream status
582  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
583  return -1;
584  }
585 
586  // Set cursor at file begin
587  m_fileHandle.clear();
588  long start_pos = m_fileHandle.tellg();
589  m_fileHandle.seekg(0);
590 
591  // Inspect header
592  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < BINARY_HEADER_SIZE / sizeof(BINARY_UINT8); ++i) {
593  BINARY_UINT8 headerCharacter;
594  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&headerCharacter), sizeof(BINARY_UINT8));
595  }
596 
597  if (m_fileHandle.eof()) {
598  info->solidErrors[0][0] = true;
599  return 0;
600  }
601 
602  // Binary files does not contain information about the solid name
603  info->solidNames.push_back("");
604 
605  // Read number of facets
606  BINARY_UINT32 nFacets;
607  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&nFacets), sizeof(BINARY_UINT32));
608  info->solidFacetCount.push_back((std::size_t) nFacets);
609  info->solidVertexCount.push_back((std::size_t) (3 * nFacets));
610 
611  if (m_fileHandle.eof()) {
612  info->solidErrors[0][0] = true;
613  return 0;
614  }
615 
616  // Check facet data
617  std::size_t n = 0;
618  while ((!m_fileHandle.eof()) && (n < nFacets)) {
619  // Read normal
620  for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j) {
621  BINARY_REAL32 N_ij;
622  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&N_ij), sizeof(BINARY_REAL32));
623  }
624 
625  // Read vertex coordinates
626  for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j) {
627  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
628  BINARY_REAL32 V_ijk;
629  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&V_ijk), sizeof(BINARY_REAL32));
630  }
631  }
632 
633  // Attribute byte count
634  BINARY_UINT16 attributeByteCount;
635  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&attributeByteCount), sizeof(BINARY_UINT16));
636 
637  // Update facet counter
638  n++;
639  }
640 
641  // Check number of facets
642  if (n < nFacets) {
643  info->solidErrors[0][1] = true;
644  }
645 
646  // Reset cursor position
647  m_fileHandle.clear();
648  m_fileHandle.seekg(start_pos);
649 
650  return 0;
651 }
652 
659 void STLReader::displayInspectionInfo(const InspectionInfo &info, std::ostream &out) const
660 {
661  out << "Inspection info" << "\n";
662 
663  out << " Filename : " << getFilename() << "\n";
664 
665  Format format = getFormat();
666  if (format == FormatBinary) {
667  out << " Format : binary" << "\n";
668  } else {
669  out << " Format : ASCII" << "\n";
670  }
671 
672  out << "\n";
673  if (info.nSolids > 0) {
674  out << " Solid count : " << info.nSolids << "\n";
675 
676  for (int i = 0; i < info.nSolids; ++i) {
677  out << "\n";
678  out << " Solid index : " << i << "\n";
679  out << " Solid name : " << info.solidNames[i] << "\n";
680  out << " Solid facets : " << info.solidFacetCount[i] << "\n";
681  out << " Solid vertices : " << info.solidVertexCount[i] << "\n";
682 
683  if (info.solidErrors[i][0]) {
684  out << " **ERROR** Unterminated solid block." << "\n";
685  }
686  if (info.solidErrors[i][1]) {
687  out << " **ERROR** Unterminated facet block." << "\n";
688  }
689  if (info.solidErrors[i][2]) {
690  out << " **ERROR** Normal data are missing." << "\n";
691  }
692  if (info.solidErrors[i][3]) {
693  out << " **ERROR** Wrong number of components for normal data." << "\n";
694  }
695  if (info.solidErrors[i][4]) {
696  out << " **ERROR** Wrong number of vertices in facet block." << "\n";
697  }
698  if (info.solidErrors[i][5]) {
699  out << " **ERROR** Wrong number of coordinates for vertice." << "\n";
700  }
701  }
702  } else {
703  out << " STL file contains no solids." << "\n";
704  }
705 
706  out.flush();
707 }
708 
717 int STLReader::readBegin()
718 {
719  if (m_fileHandle.is_open()) {
720  return -2;
721  }
722 
723  m_fileHandle.open(getFilename(), std::ifstream::in | std::ifstream::binary);
724  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
725  return -1;
726  }
727 
728  return 0;
729 }
730 
734 int STLReader::readEnd()
735 {
736  m_fileHandle.close();
737 
738  return 0;
739 }
740 
762 int STLReader::readSolid(std::string *name, std::size_t *nV, std::size_t *nT,
763  std::vector<std::array<double, 3>> *V, std::vector<std::array<double, 3>> *N,
764  std::vector<std::array<std::size_t, 3>> *T)
765 {
766  return readSolid("", name, nV, nT, V, N, T);
767 }
768 
793 int STLReader::readSolid(const std::string &solid, std::string *name, std::size_t *nV, std::size_t *nT,
794  std::vector<std::array<double, 3>> *V, std::vector<std::array<double, 3>> *N,
795  std::vector<std::array<std::size_t, 3>> *T)
796 {
797  // Read header
798  std::size_t nSolidFacets;
799  int headerError = readHeader(solid, name, &nSolidFacets);
800  if (headerError != 0) {
801  return headerError;
802  }
803 
804  // Read facet data
805  V->resize(*nV + 3 * nSolidFacets, {{0., 0., 0.}});
806  N->resize(*nT + nSolidFacets, {{0., 0., 0.}});
807  T->resize(*nT + nSolidFacets, {{0, 0, 0}});
808 
809  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < *nT; ++i) {
810  // Read facet data
811  std::array<double, 3> *V0 = V->data() + *nV + 3 * i;
812  std::array<double, 3> *V1 = V0 + 1;
813  std::array<double, 3> *V2 = V1 + 1;
814 
815  int facetError = readFacet(V0, V1, V2, N->data() + i);
816  if (facetError != 0) {
817  return facetError;
818  }
819 
820  // Update facet->vertex connectivity
821  (*T)[i][0] = *nV + 3 * i;
822  (*T)[i][1] = (*T)[i][0] + 1;
823  (*T)[i][2] = (*T)[i][1] + 1;
824  }
825 
826  // Read footer
827  int footerError = readFooter(solid);
828  if (footerError != 0) {
829  return footerError;
830  }
831 
832  return 0;
833 }
834 
848 int STLReader::readHeader(std::string *name, std::size_t *nT)
849 {
850  return readHeader("", name, nT);
851 }
852 
868 int STLReader::readHeader(const std::string &solid, std::string *name, std::size_t *nT)
869 {
870  Format format = getFormat();
871 
872  int error;
873  if (format == FormatASCII) {
874  error = readHeaderASCII(solid, name, nT);
875  } else {
876  std::string trimmedSolid = solid;
877  utils::string::trim(trimmedSolid);
878  if (!trimmedSolid.empty()) {
879  log::cout() << "WARNING: loading solids with a specific name is only supported for ASCII files." << std::endl;
880  log::cout() << " The reader will read the next solid." << std::endl;
881  }
882 
883  error = readHeaderBinary(name, nT);
884  }
885 
886  return error;
887 }
888 
899 int STLReader::readFooter()
900 {
901  return readFooter("");
902 }
903 
916 int STLReader::readFooter(const std::string &solid)
917 {
918  Format format = getFormat();
919 
920  int error;
921  if (format == FormatASCII) {
922  error = readFooterASCII(solid);
923  } else {
924  error = readFooterBinary();
925  }
926 
927  return error;
928 }
929 
945 int STLReader::readFacet(std::array<double, 3> *V0, std::array<double, 3> *V1,
946  std::array<double, 3> *V2, std::array<double, 3> *N)
947 {
948  Format format = getFormat();
949 
950  int error;
951  if (format == FormatASCII) {
952  error = readFacetASCII(V0, V1, V2, N);
953  } else {
954  error = readFacetBinary(V0, V1, V2, N);
955  }
956 
957  return error;
958 }
959 
975 int STLReader::readHeaderASCII(const std::string &solid, std::string *name, std::size_t *nT)
976 {
977  // Check stream status
978  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
979  return -1;
980  }
981 
982  // Get solid key
983  std::string solidKey = solid;
984  utils::string::trim(solidKey);
985  solidKey = ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN + " " + solidKey;
986  utils::string::trim(solidKey);
987 
988  // Scan file until solid is found
989  std::string word;
990  std::string line;
991 
992  long start_pos = m_fileHandle.tellg();
993  long current_pos = start_pos + 1;
994 
995  bool solidFound = false;
996  bool wrapAround = solidKey.compare(ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN) != 0;
997  while (!solidFound && (start_pos != current_pos)) {
998  // Get current line
999  m_lineStream.readLine(m_fileHandle);
1000 
1001  // Check end of file
1002  if (m_fileHandle.eof()) {
1003  if (wrapAround) {
1004  m_fileHandle.clear();
1005  m_fileHandle.seekg(0);
1006  wrapAround = false;
1007  } else {
1008  solidFound = false;
1009  break;
1010  }
1011  }
1012  current_pos = m_fileHandle.tellg();
1013 
1014  // Look for keyword "solid"
1015  if ((m_lineStream >> word) && (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN) == 0)) {
1016  m_lineStream.copyLine(&line);
1017  if (solidKey.compare(ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN) == 0 || line.compare(solidKey) == 0) {
1018  *name = line.erase(0, ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN.size());
1019  *name = utils::string::trim(*name);
1020 
1021  start_pos = current_pos;
1022 
1023  solidFound = true;
1024  }
1025  }
1026  }
1027 
1028  if (!solidFound) {
1029  return -2;
1030  }
1031 
1032  // Read number of facets
1033  m_fileHandle.clear();
1034  m_fileHandle.seekg(start_pos);
1035 
1036  std::array<bool, 6> solidErrors;
1037  inspectSolidASCII(nT, &solidErrors);
1038 
1039  m_fileHandle.clear();
1040  m_fileHandle.seekg(start_pos);
1041 
1042  return 0;
1043 }
1044 
1057 int STLReader::readFooterASCII(const std::string &solid)
1058 {
1059  // Check stream status
1060  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1061  return -1;
1062  }
1063 
1064  // Get solid key
1065  std::string solidKey = solid;
1066  utils::string::trim(solidKey);
1067  solidKey = ASCII_SOLID_END + " " + solidKey;
1068  utils::string::trim(solidKey);
1069 
1070  // Look for the end of solid section
1071  std::string word;
1072  std::string line;
1073 
1074  while (true) {
1075  // Get next line
1076  m_lineStream.readLine(m_fileHandle);
1077 
1078  // Get next word
1079  if (!(m_lineStream >> word)) {
1080  word = "";
1081  }
1082 
1083  // Handle the word
1084  if (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_END) == 0) {
1085  m_lineStream.copyLine(&line);
1086  if (line.compare(solidKey) != 0) {
1087  log::cout() << "WARNING: end-solid key does not match the solid name." << std::endl;
1088  log::cout() << " Expected end-solid key : " << solidKey << std::endl;
1089  log::cout() << " Current end-solid key : " << line << std::endl;
1090  }
1091 
1092  break;
1093  } else if (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN) == 0) {
1094  return -2;
1095  } else if (m_fileHandle.eof()) {
1096  return -2;
1097  }
1098  }
1099 
1100  return 0;
1101 }
1102 
1118 int STLReader::readFacetASCII(std::array<double, 3> *V0, std::array<double, 3> *V1,
1119  std::array<double, 3> *V2, std::array<double, 3> *N)
1120 {
1121  // Read facet data
1122  std::string word;
1123  std::string value;
1124  long last_valid_pos;
1125 
1126  int error = 0;
1127  int nFacetVertices = 0;
1128  std::string target = "facet";
1129  while (true) {
1130  // Get next line
1131  last_valid_pos = m_fileHandle.tellg();
1132  m_lineStream.readLine(m_fileHandle);
1133  if (!(m_lineStream >> word)) {
1134  continue;
1135  }
1136 
1137  // Handle the word
1138  //
1139  // Beginning of faacet section and normal are on the same line, after
1140  // finding the beginning of the facet section we have to extract the
1141  // next word without getting a new line.
1142  if (word.compare(ASCII_FACET_BEGIN) == 0) {
1143  if (word.compare(target) == 0) {
1144  target = "normal";
1145 
1146  if (!(m_lineStream >> word)) {
1147  continue;
1148  }
1149  } else {
1150  error = -2;
1151  break;
1152  }
1153  }
1154 
1155  if (word.compare(ASCII_FACET_END) == 0) {
1156  if (word.compare(target) == 0) {
1157  break;
1158  } else {
1159  error = -2;
1160  break;
1161  }
1162  } else if (word.compare("normal") == 0) {
1163  if (word.compare(target) == 0) {
1164  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1165  m_lineStream >> value;
1166  (*N)[k] = stod(value);
1167  }
1168  target = "vertex";
1169  } else {
1170  error = -2;
1171  break;
1172  }
1173  } else if (word.compare("vertex") == 0) {
1174  if (word.compare(target) == 0) {
1175  std::array<double, 3> *coords;
1176  if (nFacetVertices == 0) {
1177  coords = V0;
1178  } else if (nFacetVertices == 1) {
1179  coords = V1;
1180  } else if (nFacetVertices == 2) {
1181  coords = V2;
1182  target = ASCII_FACET_END;
1183  } else {
1184  error = -3;
1185  break;
1186  }
1187 
1188  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1189  m_lineStream >> value;
1190  (*coords)[k] = stod(value);
1191  }
1192 
1193  nFacetVertices++;
1194  } else {
1195  error = -2;
1196  break;
1197  }
1198  } else if (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN) == 0) {
1199  error = -2;
1200  break;
1201  } else if (word.compare(ASCII_SOLID_END) == 0) {
1202  error = -2;
1203  break;
1204  } else if (m_fileHandle.eof()) {
1205  error = -2;
1206  break;
1207  }
1208  }
1209 
1210  // Restor cursor position
1211  if (error != 0) {
1212  m_fileHandle.clear();
1213  m_fileHandle.seekg(last_valid_pos);
1214  }
1215 
1216  return error;
1217 }
1218 
1232 int STLReader::readHeaderBinary(std::string *name, std::size_t *nT)
1233 {
1234  // Check stream status
1235  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1236  return -1;
1237  }
1238 
1239  // Binary data has not information about solid names
1240  (*name) = "";
1241 
1242  // Skip header
1243  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < BINARY_HEADER_SIZE / sizeof(BINARY_UINT8); ++i) {
1244  BINARY_UINT8 headerCharacter;
1245  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&headerCharacter), sizeof(BINARY_UINT8));
1246  }
1247 
1248  // Read number of facets
1249  BINARY_UINT32 nSolidFacets;
1250  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&nSolidFacets), sizeof(BINARY_UINT32));
1251  *nT = nSolidFacets;
1252 
1253  // Check if the end of file has been reached
1254  if (m_fileHandle.eof()) {
1255  return -2;
1256  }
1257 
1258  return 0;
1259 }
1260 
1270 int STLReader::readFooterBinary()
1271 {
1272  // Check stream status
1273  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1274  return -1;
1275  }
1276 
1277  // Nothing to do
1278  return 0;
1279 }
1280 
1295 int STLReader::readFacetBinary(std::array<double, 3> *V0, std::array<double, 3> *V1,
1296  std::array<double, 3> *V2, std::array<double, 3> *N)
1297 {
1298  // Check stream status
1299  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1300  return -1;
1301  }
1302 
1303  // Read normal
1304  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1305  BINARY_REAL32 N_k;
1306  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&N_k), sizeof(BINARY_REAL32));
1307  (*N)[k] = (double) N_k;
1308  }
1309 
1310  // Read vertex coordinates
1311  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1312  BINARY_REAL32 V_k;
1313  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&V_k), sizeof(BINARY_REAL32));
1314  (*V0)[k] = (double) V_k;
1315  }
1316 
1317  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1318  BINARY_REAL32 V_k;
1319  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&V_k), sizeof(BINARY_REAL32));
1320  (*V1)[k] = (double) V_k;
1321  }
1322 
1323  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1324  BINARY_REAL32 V_k;
1325  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&V_k), sizeof(BINARY_REAL32));
1326  (*V2)[k] = (double) V_k;
1327  }
1328 
1329  // Attribute byte count
1330  BINARY_UINT16 attributeByteCount;
1331  m_fileHandle.read(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&attributeByteCount), sizeof(BINARY_UINT16));
1332 
1333  // Check if the end of file has been reached
1334  if (m_fileHandle.eof()) {
1335  return -2;
1336  }
1337 
1338  return 0;
1339 }
1340 
1352 STLWriter::STLWriter(const std::string &filename, Format format)
1353  : STLBase(filename, format)
1354 {
1355  if (format == FormatUnknown) {
1356  throw std::runtime_error("Invalid STL format.");
1357  }
1358 }
1359 
1368 int STLWriter::writeBegin(WriteMode writeMode, bool partialWrite)
1369 {
1370  if (m_fileHandle.is_open()) {
1371  return -2;
1372  }
1373 
1374  Format format = getFormat();
1375 
1376  std::ios_base::openmode openMode;
1377  if (format == FormatBinary) {
1378  if (writeMode == WriteOverwrite) {
1379  openMode = std::ofstream::out | std::ofstream::binary;
1380  } else if (partialWrite && writeMode == WriteAppend) {
1381  openMode = std::ofstream::app | std::ofstream::binary;
1382  } else {
1383  throw std::runtime_error("Specified write mode is not supported for binary files.");
1384  }
1385  } else {
1386  if (writeMode == WriteOverwrite) {
1387  openMode = std::ofstream::out;
1388  } else if (writeMode == WriteAppend) {
1389  openMode = std::ofstream::app;
1390  } else {
1391  throw std::runtime_error("Specified write mode is not supported for ASCII files.");
1392  }
1393  }
1394 
1395  m_fileHandle.open(getFilename(), openMode);
1396  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1397  return -1;
1398  }
1399 
1400  // Set stream properties
1401  m_fileHandle << std::scientific;
1402 
1403  return 0;
1404 }
1405 
1409 int STLWriter::writeEnd()
1410 {
1411  m_fileHandle.close();
1412 
1413  return 0;
1414 }
1415 
1432 int STLWriter::writeSolid(const std::string &name, std::size_t nV, std::size_t nT,
1433  const std::vector<std::array<double,3>> &V, const std::vector<std::array<double,3>> &N,
1434  const std::vector<std::array<std::size_t,3>> &T)
1435 {
1436  // Check input variables
1437  if (V.size() < nV) {
1438  return -2;
1439  }
1440 
1441  if (T.size() < nT) {
1442  return -2;
1443  }
1444 
1445  if (N.size() < nT) {
1446  return -2;
1447  }
1448 
1449  // Save stream flags
1450  std::ios::fmtflags streamFlags(m_fileHandle.flags());
1451 
1452  // Write header
1453  int headerError = writeHeader(name, nT);
1454  if (headerError != 0) {
1455  return headerError;
1456  }
1457 
1458  // Write facet data
1459  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < nT; ++i) {
1460  // Check connectivity
1461  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1462  if (T[i][k] >= nV) {
1463  return -2;
1464  }
1465  }
1466 
1467  // Write data
1468  int facetError = writeFacet(V[T[i][0]], V[T[i][1]], V[T[i][2]], N[i]);
1469  if (facetError != 0) {
1470  return facetError;
1471  }
1472  }
1473 
1474  // Write footer
1475  int footerError = writeFooter(name);
1476  if (footerError != 0) {
1477  return footerError;
1478  }
1479 
1480  // Restore stream flags
1481  m_fileHandle.flags(streamFlags);
1482 
1483  return 0;
1484 }
1485 
1497 int STLWriter::writeHeader(const std::string &name, std::size_t nT)
1498 {
1499  Format format = getFormat();
1500 
1501  int error;
1502  if (format == FormatASCII) {
1503  error = writeHeaderASCII(name, nT);
1504  } else {
1505  error = writeHeaderBinary(name, nT);
1506  }
1507 
1508  return error;
1509 }
1510 
1521 int STLWriter::writeFooter(const std::string &name)
1522 {
1523  Format format = getFormat();
1524 
1525  int error;
1526  if (format == FormatASCII) {
1527  error = writeFooterASCII(name);
1528  } else {
1529  error = writeFooterBinary(name);
1530  }
1531 
1532  return error;
1533 }
1534 
1548 int STLWriter::writeFacet(const std::array<double, 3> &V0, const std::array<double, 3> &V1,
1549  const std::array<double, 3> &V2, const std::array<double, 3> &N)
1550 {
1551  Format format = getFormat();
1552 
1553  int error;
1554  if (format == FormatASCII) {
1555  error = writeFacetASCII(V0, V1, V2, N);
1556  } else {
1557  error = writeFacetBinary(V0, V1, V2, N);
1558  }
1559 
1560  return error;
1561 }
1562 
1574 int STLWriter::writeHeaderASCII(const std::string &name, std::size_t nT)
1575 {
1576  BITPIT_UNUSED(nT);
1577 
1578  // Check stream status
1579  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1580  return -1;
1581  }
1582 
1583  // Write header
1584  std::stringstream sheader;
1585  sheader << ASCII_SOLID_BEGIN << " " << name;
1586 
1587  // Write number of facets
1588  std::string header = sheader.str();
1589  header = utils::string::trim(header);
1590  m_fileHandle << header << "\n";
1591 
1592  return 0;
1593 }
1594 
1605 int STLWriter::writeFooterASCII(const std::string &name)
1606 {
1607  BITPIT_UNUSED(name);
1608 
1609  // Check stream status
1610  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1611  return -1;
1612  }
1613 
1614  // Write footer
1615  std::stringstream sfooter;
1616  sfooter << ASCII_SOLID_END << " " << name;
1617 
1618  std::string footer;
1619  footer = sfooter.str();
1620  footer = utils::string::trim(footer);
1621  m_fileHandle << footer << "\n";
1622 
1623  return 0;
1624 }

1639 int STLWriter::writeFacetASCII(const std::array<double, 3> &V0, const std::array<double, 3> &V1,
1640  const std::array<double, 3> &V2, const std::array<double, 3> &N)
1641 {
1642  // Check stream status
1643  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1644  return -1;
1645  }
1646 
1647  // Facet header
1648  m_fileHandle << " " << ASCII_FACET_BEGIN;
1649 
1650  // Facet normal
1651  m_fileHandle << " normal ";
1652  m_fileHandle << N[0] << " ";
1653  m_fileHandle << N[1] << " ";
1654  m_fileHandle << N[2];
1655  m_fileHandle << "\n";
1656 
1657  // Facet vertices
1658  m_fileHandle << " outer loop" << "\n";
1659 
1660  m_fileHandle << " vertex ";
1661  m_fileHandle << V0[0] << " ";
1662  m_fileHandle << V0[1] << " ";
1663  m_fileHandle << V0[2];
1664  m_fileHandle << "\n";
1665 
1666  m_fileHandle << " vertex ";
1667  m_fileHandle << V1[0] << " ";
1668  m_fileHandle << V1[1] << " ";
1669  m_fileHandle << V1[2];
1670  m_fileHandle << "\n";
1671 
1672  m_fileHandle << " vertex ";
1673  m_fileHandle << V2[0] << " ";
1674  m_fileHandle << V2[1] << " ";
1675  m_fileHandle << V2[2];
1676  m_fileHandle << "\n";
1677 
1678  m_fileHandle << " endloop" << "\n";
1679 
1680  // Facet footer
1681  m_fileHandle << " " << ASCII_FACET_END << "\n";
1682 
1683  return 0;
1684 }
1685 
1697 int STLWriter::writeHeaderBinary(const std::string &name, std::size_t nT)
1698 {
1699  BITPIT_UNUSED(name);
1700 
1701  // Check stream status
1702  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1703  return -1;
1704  }
1705 
1706  // Write header
1707  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < BINARY_HEADER_SIZE / sizeof(BINARY_UINT8); ++i) {
1708  BINARY_UINT8 headerCharacter = 0;
1709  m_fileHandle.write(reinterpret_cast<char*>(&headerCharacter), sizeof(BINARY_UINT8));
1710  }
1711 
1712  // Write number of facets
1713  BINARY_UINT32 nFacets = (BINARY_UINT32) nT;
1714  m_fileHandle.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&nFacets), sizeof(BINARY_UINT32));
1715 
1716  return 0;
1717 }

1729 int STLWriter::writeFooterBinary(const std::string &name)
1730 {
1731  BITPIT_UNUSED(name);
1732 
1733  // Check stream status
1734  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1735  return -1;
1736  }
1737 
1738  // Nothing to do
1739  return 0;
1740 }

1755 int STLWriter::writeFacetBinary(const std::array<double, 3> &V0, const std::array<double, 3> &V1,
1756  const std::array<double, 3> &V2, const std::array<double, 3> &N)
1757 {
1758  // Check stream status
1759  if (!m_fileHandle.good()) {
1760  return -1;
1761  }
1762 
1763  // Normals
1764  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1765  BINARY_REAL32 N_k = (BINARY_REAL32) N[k];
1766  m_fileHandle.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&N_k), sizeof(BINARY_REAL32));
1767  }
1768 
1769  // Vertices
1770  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1771  BINARY_REAL32 V_k = (BINARY_REAL32) V0[k];
1772  m_fileHandle.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&V_k), sizeof(BINARY_REAL32));
1773  }
1774 
1775  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1776  BINARY_REAL32 V_k = (BINARY_REAL32) V1[k];
1777  m_fileHandle.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&V_k), sizeof(BINARY_REAL32));
1778  }
1779 
1780  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k) {
1781  BINARY_REAL32 V_k = (BINARY_REAL32) V2[k];
1782  m_fileHandle.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&V_k), sizeof(BINARY_REAL32));
1783  }
1784 
1785  // Attribute byte count
1786  //
1787  // In the standard format, this should be zero because most software
1788  // does not understand anything else.
1789  // Attribute byte count
1790  BINARY_UINT16 attributeByteCount = 0;
1791  m_fileHandle.write(reinterpret_cast<char *>(&attributeByteCount), sizeof(BINARY_UINT16));
1792 
1793  return 0;
1794 }
